title: New Mexico begins U.S. border wall upgrade
text:
New Mexico begins U.S. border wall upgrade 11:28am BST - 01:23 
The United States begins construction of a new border wall in Santa Teresa, New Mexico, to meet new, tougher standards set by the Department of Homeland Security under President Donald Trump.   
The United States begins construction of a new border wall in Santa Teresa, New Mexico, to meet new, tougher standards set by the Department of Homeland Security under President Donald Trump.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/10/new-mexico-begins-us-border-wall-upgrade?videoId=416488385&videoChannel=13422
